title: To my very louing brethren the ministers and to the church- wardens, and side-men, of euery parish, and precinct, within my archdeaconry of London
author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of London. Archdeacon (1625-1662 : Paske)
notes: Signed: London, this Tenth day of December. An. Dom. 1627. Your very louing brother, and friend. Tho: Paske.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
